name: Origin LabTalk Script File
summary: An OGS file contains LabTalk script used by Origin, a data analysis and graphing application used by various scientists and engineers. It stores commands in plain text that can be executed to perform analysis and graphing of data. OGS files can be used for various purposes, including calculating simple mathematical problems and graphing complex equations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
